author: abehazbunjr
title: Market-Agnostic Recursive Royalties
description: While charities struggle with exposure, CNFT markets struggle to agree on and apply royalty mechanisms that won't fit every situation.
solution: A minting service and UI that can create CNFTs that "sell themselves" recursively, with dynamic payto addresses that incentivize sharing.
experience: I am a full-time Plutus student with two years of Cardano experience and 14 years of web analytics and managing large technical projects.
